subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors, gearing up for the start of Barry Bonds’s perjury trial in March, submitted an outline of their legal strategy and a list of witnesses that includes former baseball players they intend to call.
snippet: Federal prosecutors, gearing up for the start of Barry Bonds’s perjury trial in March, submitted an outline of their legal strategy and a list of witnesses that includes former baseball players they intend to call.
